text: The Fly is an American science fiction horror movie set in Montreal. It is directed by Kurt Neumann and written by James Clavell. It was followed by two sequels: Return of the Fly and Curse of the Fly. A remake was released in 1986. == Other websites == * Category:1958 science fiction movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American monster movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Body horror movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Montreal Category:1950s horror movies Category:Movies directed by Kurt Neumann
title: The Fly (1958 movie)
